componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
ACCOUNT IN LITIGATION


This deal has been identified in association to an investigation. It requires that we preserve all relevant information in connection with the Account, Contact, and/or Deal information. Please do not delete or modify information related to this Account, Contact(s), and/or Deal(s)

 

In addition, please do not discuss the investigation with contacts from this deal should he/she contacts you in connection to details associated to this account.

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Account In Foreclosure -- REFER TO ASSET MANAGEMENT

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
Do Not Lend

This Account has been tagged as "Do Not Lend". For further details, please refer to Legal Team or Executive Team Member. Check the Notes Tab on the Account as it may also contain details regarding the reason.

visibilityRule.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 8 AND 9

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value: Please note: Only SFRs, Condos and Townhomes will show up to pull RedBell data. Multi Units will not show up.

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Document_Type__c LIKE '%Term Sheet%' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Type__c = 'Background and Credit Information' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Type__c = 'Borrower Entity Information' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Type__c = 'Closing Documents / Requirements' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: Type__c = 'Detailed Renovation Information' AND Is_Deleted__c = false

componentInstanceProperties.name: whereClause
componentInstanceProperties.value: (Type__c = 'Advance Funding' OR Advance__c != null) AND Is_Deleted__c = false
